title: Dynaplug Road Tubeless Tools punch in smaller, shorter road tire specific plugs
content:
Optimized for smaller diameter tires, Dynaplug Road tubeless repair tools adapt the best of proven Dynaplug tire repair tech for all road bikes. The most popular best sellers are there – both a Dynaplug Carbon Road Racer & Dynaplug Air Road, with shorter insertion tubes –  but new shorter Road Plugs are also available to […]

The post Dynaplug Road Tubeless Tools punch in smaller, shorter road tire specific plugs appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
